mapper.select: select IFNULL(max(check_num),0) check_num from online_check where ml_num=#{ml_num} and online_num=#{online_num}
mapper.insert: insert into online_check values(#{check_num},#{ml_num},#{online_num},#{view_point},now()) on duplicate key update check_num=#{check_num},view_point=#{view_point},view_regdate=now()
mapper.select: select IFNULL(max(view_point),0) view_point from online_check where ml_num=#{ml_num} and online_num=#{online_num}
